DOC.brief_summary: SRACE multicenter observational database outcomes patient hospitalize acute coronary event . SRACE include 20 hospital Shanghai China enrol total 3,000 patient since 2005 , annual enrollment 500 patient . The major purpose SRACE program evaluate prognosis patient admitted hospital due acute coronary event , compare different therapeutic strategy , in-hospital transferring system , . All participate physician receive confidential quarterly report show ther outcome side-by-side aggregate outcome participate hospital .
DOC.detailed_description: consecutive patient STEMI present symptom within 12 hour treat primary PCI Shanghai , enrol prospective sysytem . Several strategy apply patient , include physician vs. patient transfer strategy , upsteam vs. downstream strategy , Firebird stent vs. Excel stent ( bio-absorbable SES ) , etc . Once patient randomize one study , deny others . Clinical angiographic outcome compare , final purpose find optimal strategy treat AMI patient .
